input.description:
adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter use to handle the request.
Default value: VMwareVCloud

items The items XML used to perform action on one or more items within vCloud.
Value takes the form:
<items> <item> <operation-name>..</operation-name> <parameters> .......... </parameters> </item> </items>
version The VMware vCloud Express API version. The current supported versions are v1.0, v1.5 and v5.1

The input for different operations that can be performed for version 1.0, 1.5 and 5.1
Power On vApp = Power_On_vApp Power Off vApp = Power_Of_vApp Reboot OS = Reboot_OS Shutdown OS = Shutdown_OS Reset vApp = Reset_vApp Suspend vApp = Suspend_vApp Instantiate vApp Template = Instantiate_vApp_Template Deploy vApp = Deploy_vApp Undeploy vApp = Undeploy_vApp Clone vApp = Clone_vApp Capture vApp = Capture_vApp Compose vApp = Compose_vApp Clone vApp Template = Clone_vApp_Template Import OVF As vApp Template = Import_Ovf_As_vApp_Template Export vApp Template as OVF = Export_vApp_Template_As_Ovf

connection parameters [optional] The XML containing the metadata needed by the adapter to connect to the target.
Value takes the form:
<connection-parameters> <vcloud-organization></vcloud-organization> <user-name></user-name> <password></password> </connection-parameters>

documentation.description:
Perform Operations Perform action on the VCloud.
Power On vApp Power Off vApp Reboot OS Shutdown OS Reset vApp Suspend vApp Instantiate vApp Template Deploy vApp Undeploy vApp Clone vApp Capture vApp Compose vApp Clone vApp Template Import OVF As vApp Template Export vApp Template as OVF
